arts.ttl: Monaco vs Tottenham Prediction: Spurs Look to Bounce Back From Weekend Defeat
arts.sum: We look ahead to the UEFA Champions League game at Stade Louis II with our Monaco vs Tottenham prediction and preview. The post Monaco vs Tottenham Prediction: Spurs Look to Bounce Back From Weekend Defeat appeared first on Opta Analyst.

arts.ttl: How Frank can make Champions League history for Spurs in Monaco clash
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur head coach Thomas Frank could create Champions League history for the Lilywhites when they face Monaco in Wednesday's league-phase battle.
